mapper.insert: insert into lease( id, carId, unit, type, startmiles, endmiles, position, status, startdate, enddate ) values ( #{id}, #{carId}, #{unit}, #{type}, #{startmiles}, #{endmiles}, #{position}, #{status}, #{startdate}, #{enddate} )
mapper.update: update lease set carId = #{carId}, unit = #{unit}, type = #{type}, startmiles = #{startmiles}, endmiles = #{endmiles}, position = #{position}, status = #{status}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate} where id = #{id}
